etomica.space

Class BoundaryDeformableLattice

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.space.Boundary
      • etomica.space.BoundaryDeformablePeriodic
        • etomica.space.BoundaryDeformableLattice
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBoundary, java.io.Serializable

    public class BoundaryDeformableLattice
extends BoundaryDeformablePeriodic
    Deformable boundary that takes the shape of a primitive with some number of cells in each dimension.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      BoundaryDeformableLattice(Primitive primitive, double[] nCells)
      Creates boundary with the shape of the given primitive and the given number of cells for each dimension.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BoundaryDeformableLattice

        public BoundaryDeformableLattice(Primitive primitive,
                                 int[] nCells)
        Creates boundary with the shape of the given primitive and the given number of cells for each dimension. Changes to the primitive after creating this instance will not affect the boundary.

      • BoundaryDeformableLattice

        public BoundaryDeformableLattice(Primitive primitive,
                                 double[] nCells)
        Creates boundary with the shape of the given primitive and the given number of cells for each dimension. Changes to the primitive after creating this instance will not affect the boundary.
